name: FPS Prototype macOS version
description:
FPS Prototype is a First-Person Shooter game. The game is set in a danger room where the player shoots the incoming enemies who are advancing toward you. Your objective is to stay alive and not let the enemies touch you.

Movement: WASD

Fire Weapon: Left-Mouse Click

Aim-Down Sights: Right-Mouse Click

Jump: Space Bar

Sprint: Left-Shift Key

Deploy Shield-Grenade: G

Switch Weapons: 1 or 2. or Mouse Wheel

Music:

Force (NCS Release) by Alan Walker
